awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Claudine tries to provide for her six children in Harlem while on welfare. She has a romance with Roop, a cheerful garbageman she meets while working on the side as a maid.

title: Claudine
